job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pThe Software Engineer is part of the Software Applications Development Team and is responsible for analyzing component requirements designing software solutions and implementing Bigfoot software systems on mobile and cloud platforms Bigfoot Software Engineers are also responsible for developing and maintaining automated software component tests and test frameworks The right person for this role will be a detailoriented resultsoriented self starter with the flexibility to adapt to change in a fastpaced startup environmentppbrppstrongEssential Duties and ResponsibilitiesstrongpulliSoftware Development Design and Implement component software requirements Write detailed design documentation Implement automated tests for component requirementsliliTest Frameworks Implement and maintain testing frameworks and infrastructureliliDevOps Implement and maintain CI and CD infrastructureliulpbrppstrongspan classqlcursorspanSkills amp Experience Requirementsstrongpulli2 years recent handson software development experience in a leanagile environmentliliProficient in Java and Typescript or JavascriptliliExperience building Web Applications Mobile Applications and RESTful web servicesliliExperience with writing tests and using test frameworksliliAbility to rapidly learn and adopt new skills and technologyliliStrong written and verbal communication skillsliliDetail oriented selfmotivated selforganizing and committed to delivering high quality workliliAdditionally the ideal candidate will possess the followingliliExperience with React and React NativeliliExperience with iOS developmentnbspSwift and Android development JavaKotlinliliExperience with AWS including EC2 Kinesis Redis Elastic SearchliliStrong technical and leadership skills decisive determined strategic and able to lead motivate and inspire othersliulpstrongEducation RequirementsstrongpulliBSc STEMs or higherliulpp
